title: Nuclear energy - global market size by segment through 2030
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market size in billion USD on the Y-axis for 6 different Power Types for 2 groups 2011, and 2030 that are presented on the X-axis.

In Power Type Nuclear generation, 2030 had the highest Market size in billion USD 300.0 among the 2 groups and in Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel, 2011 had the lowest Market size in billion USD 3.0.
In Power Type Nuclear generation, 2030 had the maximum Market size in billion USD and it saw the lowest in Power Type Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel out of all 6 Power Types.
Power Type Nuclear generation and Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel had the biggest gap of 291.0 between the highest and lowest Market size in billion USD found for 2030.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market size in billion USD on the Y-axis for 6 different Power Types for 2 groups 2011, and 2030 that are presented on the X-axis.

Power Type Nuclear generation had the maximum Market size in billion USD among all 2 groups, and it was for 2030. The minimum Market size in billion USD was observed in Power Type Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel for 2011.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market size in billion USD on the Y-axis for 6 different Power Types for 2 groups 2011, and 2030 that are presented on the X-axis.

In Power Type Nuclear generation, 2030 had the highest Market size in billion USD 300.0 among the 2 groups and in Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel, 2011 had the lowest Market size in billion USD 3.0.
In Power Type Nuclear generation, 2030 had the maximum Market size in billion USD and it saw the lowest in Power Type Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel out of all 6 Power Types.
Power Type Nuclear generation and Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel had the biggest gap of 291.0 between the highest and lowest Market size in billion USD found for 2030.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Power Types on X-axis for 2 groups 2011, and 2030. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market size in billion USD.

Out of all 2 groups, 2030 had the highest Market size in billion USD in Power Type Nuclear generation and 2011 had the lowest Market size in billion USD in Power Type Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel.

Among all the Power Types, 2030 had the highest Market size in billion USD in Power Type Nuclear generation and lowest Market size in billion USD in Power Type Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel.

The maximum Market size in billion USD for 2030 that was found in Power Type Nuclear generation was 33.33 times larger than the minimum Market size in billion USD observed in Power Type Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel.

Among all 2 groups, 2011 had the gap of 130.0 between the maximum and minimum Market size in billion USD observed in Power Type Nuclear generation and Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel respectively.

Averaging all 2 groups 2011, and 2030, the Power Type Nuclear generation is the maximum Market size in billion USD and Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel is the minimum Market size in billion USD.

data.Power Type: Spent nuclear fuel reprocessing and secondary fuel
